description.short:
The NH München Airport hotel offers easy access to Munich Airport. It’s 2 kilometers away and can be reached by shuttle bus. And we’re 10 minutes from Therme Erding, Europe’s largest thermal-bath complex, while Bayern Munich football stadium is 20 minutes away. And if you want to visit Munich, the city center is easily reached via airport shuttle or S-Bahn train. The journey takes around 45 minutes.

-easy access and close to Munich Airport 
-10 minutes from Europe’s largest thermal-bath complex 
-45-minute train ride from Munich city center

description.short: Between Siena and Grosseto, surrounded by nature, where silence is at home. Le Casaline farmhouse is located on a panoramic hill, in the countryside of Seggiano, a place famous for its history and also for the excellent oil produced by the monocultivar of Olivastra Seggianese. The old farmhouse, renovated in 2006, is divided into 4 different apartments, each with independent entrance and equipped with bathroom, kitchenette, wi-fi.

roomTypes.name: Venere e Minerva
roomTypes.description: Venere and Minerva are apartments located on the first floor of the structure and consist of two double bedrooms, living room with kitchenette and bathroom with shower.

roomTypes.name: Apartment with Patio and Panoramic View
roomTypes.description: Giunone and Febe are small and intimate flats, consisting of a double bedroom, a large living room with kitchenette and a bathroom with shower.

description.short:
In the heart of Chianti, just 7 km from the city of Certaldo and 35 from the magnificent Florence, Fattoria Bacìo stands on the top of a hill, among the unmistakable hilly landscapes of Tuscany.
The farmhouse consists of a large manor house, of nineteenth-century origin, can accommodate up to 17 people and the farmhouses, expertly transformed into elegant and refined private apartments. The large garden hosts century-old trees, plants and flowers and offers the possibility of dining outdoors. At guests' disposal also a beautiful swimming pool overlooking the Chianti valley.

roomTypes.name: Classic One Room with Panoramic view
roomTypes.description: Double room located in the farmhouse villa. It enjoys a view over the estate's vineyards.

roomTypes.name: Casa Lorenzo
roomTypes.description:
Very close to The Cascinale, sharing the same big garden of Villa Bacìo, this apartment with woodbeamed ceilings and terracotta floors is nicely furnished. It includes a living room with kitchen corner, 2 double bedrooms, 1 bathroom with shower. It comes with a baking oven under the outside porch. The apartment has independent heating.
The swimming pool (16m x 6.50m) situated in a splendid scenic site is shared with all guests.

roomTypes.name: Casa Azalea
roomTypes.description:
This lovely restored farm house with woodbeamed ceilings and tiled floors is situated in the garden of Villa Bacìo the main building. Although Casa Azalea shares the same big garden with other guests, the beautiful Azaleas give the opportunity for creating one’s own secluded corner. The apartment is composed of a living room, a large kitchen with a characteristic fireplace, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom with shower. The apartment has independent heating.
The swimming pool (16m x 6.50m) situated in a splendid scenic site is shared with all guests.

roomTypes.name: Palavigne
roomTypes.description: Immersed in the characteristic countryside of Tuscany, amongst olive groves, cypresses and vineyards, at 300m distance from Fattoria di Bacìo, this small wonderfully restored stone house with woodbeamed ceilings and terracotta floors is ideal for a couple. It comes with a living room with kitchen corner, 1 double room, 1 bathroom with shower. The furniture combines antique and modern pieces.

roomTypes.name: Palavigne
roomTypes.description:
This beautiful farm house, 300m distance from Villa Bacìo is completely immersed in an oasis of peace. From its terrace you can admire the undulating slopes of the Chianti Hills. The ground floor is composed of a wide living room with sofas and an unusual fireplace; a wide kitchen with a characteristic fireplace. On the first floor there are 5 nice double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Woodbeamed ceilings, white washed walls and terracotta floor provide the Tuscan touch. The swimming pool (16m x 6.50m) ) situated in the garden of Villa Bacìo overlooking the vineyards and olive trees of the Estate is shared with all guests.

The farm house has independent heating.

There is the possibility to connect the Palavigne Farm House to the close by Palavigne Apartment.

roomTypes.name: Oliveta
roomTypes.description:
Located at 30 metres distance from Villa Bacìo, this nice farm house surrounded by olive groves has been restored in the authentic Tuscan style. Downstairs there is a large living room with characteristic fire place used in the past by the old farmers, a sofa bed and a dining-room corner. From the kitchen there is access to a paved garden. It offers the opportunity to eat alfresco and to enjoy the countryard sight. On the first floor there are two bedrooms and two bathrooms with shower.
The swimming pool (16m x 6.50m) situated in a splendid scenic site is shared with all guests.

roomTypes.name: Melograno
roomTypes.description:
Located at 30 metres distance from Villa Bacìo, this nice farm house surrounded by olive groves has been restored in the authentic Tuscan style. Downstairs there’s a little fireplace and a sofa, a dining room with a kitchen corner from where there is an access to a paved garden with tables and chairs to eat “alfresco”. From there you can enjoy the Tuscan countryard sight. On the first floor there are 2 bedrooms and a

The beautiful swimming pool of Fattoria Bacìo (16m x 6,5m) is situated in a splendin scenic site. It overlooks the gently undulated slopes of vineyard country. Shared with all its guests, it gives them the oppurtunity to stay in complete relaxation to enjoy the sun and the great view.

roomTypes.name: Triple Room with Panoramic View
roomTypes.description: Triple room with a double bed and a single bed located in the farmhouse villa. It enjoys a view over the farm's vineyards.

roomTypes.name: Standard One Room with Private External Bathroom
roomTypes.description: Rooms with Panoramic View located in the historic Villa.

roomTypes.name: Classic Quadruple Room with Private Exterior Bathroom
roomTypes.description: Rooms with Panoramic View located in the historic Villa.

roomTypes.name: Villa
roomTypes.description:
The prestige period house surrounded by a garden with beautiful trees sits on top of a hill on a splendid scenic site. From there you can admire groups of cypress trees, vineyards, olive groves, wheat, woodlands and, in the distance, even San Gimignano’s towers.
Downstairs there is a big entrance. On the first floor, a large well equipped kitchen with fireplace, a large dining room, a large living room with fireplace, 9 antique furnished double bedrooms named after the flowers of the garden, 6 bathrooms.
The swimming pool (16m x 6.50m) situated in a splendid scenic site is shared with all guests.

roomTypes.name: Casina
roomTypes.description:
In oasis of peace, 30 m distance from Fattoria Bacìo, lies a fine small red brick house surrounded by olive groves.
From the big terrace, with its tiled floor there is a beautiful view of the Tuscan hills.
The apartment is composed of a living room with a kitchen corner and a fireplace, a double bedroom and a bathroom with shower. The apartment is heated by electric stoves.
The swimming pool (16m x 6.50m) situated in a splendid scenic site is shared with all guests.

roomTypes.name: Cascinale
roomTypes.description:
This beautifully restored farm house is situated in the garden of Villa Bacìo, the main building. Woodbeamed ceilings, whitewashed walls and terracotta floors provide the Tuscan touch. The apartment is composed of a wide living-room with sofas and a characteristic fireplace, a dining room, a large kitchen, 3 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a little storage room. The apartment has independent heating.
The swimming pool (16m x 6.50m) situated in a splendid scenic site is shared with all guests.

roomTypes.name: Casa Dante
roomTypes.description:
In the pinewood, close to Villa Bacìo, a finely furnished first floor apartment consisting of a wide living-room with kitchenette, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a little storage room. The surrounding pinewood gives the guests the opportunity of living in a peaceful area in complete relaxation.
The swimming pool (16m x 6.50m) situated in a splendid scenic site is shared with all guests.
The house is available from May to September.

description.short:
Tenuta Il Sassone: all the comfort of a 5-star Charming Residence in the nature in Tuscany. We chased a dream and made it come true at Il Sassone.
Here we indulge in the excitement of the scents of the uncontaminated scrub, of the vivid and dazzling colors of the Tuscan Maremma, of the most genuine and authentic nature, of the silences, interspersed by the breeze and the friendly presences of the many wild, alive and vital animals around us.

roomTypes.name: Biancospino
roomTypes.description:
The bespoke painted decoration by skilled artists merges multiple shades of grey with hints of red details that recall red hawthorn berries, giving this room a particular charm and fascination. The sky blue walls in the bathroom are combined with tiles to give an immediate sense of well-being.

This room has a king sized bed with a hypoallergenic, medium firm spring mattress which is ideal for those looking for medium firm support.

There is also a sofa bed which makes the room possibly triple.

roomTypes.name: Oleandro
roomTypes.description: In this Classic room, shades of pink dominate, recalling the flowers of the vigorous oleander hedge surrounding the Villa. The view on the main loggia and on the porch that leads to the Sala Novecento, gives this room a breathtaking view. The double bed is equipped with an extremely comfortable latex mattress.

roomTypes.name: Rosa Canina
roomTypes.description: Pink and grey mother of pearl give this room a quiet sophistication leaving space for emotions and the need for balance. A hundred year old oak tree casts it shadow through the oval bathroom window. This antique flavour Superior room can have a double bed or two single beds. The hypoallergenic, medium firm spring mattresses are ideal for those looking for medium firm support.

roomTypes.name: Sambuco
roomTypes.description:
This Superior room on the first floor with a vigorous colour scheme recalls the woody essence and aromas of the elderflower. The warmth of the wooden floor and the gold, orange and cocoa colour tiles in the bathroom purify, revitalize and stimulate physical and mental regeneration.

This room can be adjoined to the Achillea double bedroom to make a communicating room to form a spacious Suite. The wrought iron canopy bed has a very firm hypoallergenic spring mattress which is ideal for those looking for a comfortably firm support.

description.short: The nhow Marseille, formerly known as NH Marseille Palm Beach, is a new designer hotel situated in one of the Mediterranean's most beautiful bays. The hotel, built in 1976 and totally renovated in 2018, features modern decor from the likes of Teresa Sapey, Claire Fatosme and Christian Lefèvre, well known designers & architects. Cleverly nestled in the rocky coastline, the hotel boasts sea views and a plethora of nearby beaches to while the day away.

description.short: The property is surrounded by a large well-kept garden of over 1000 m2 with holm oaks, olive trees and hundreds of typical Maremma plants. The materials used for the exterior such as wood, stone and terracotta harmonize with the garden in the center of which there is a large swimming pool of 12m x 6m equipped with sofa beds and hot shower, ideal for swimming and relaxing. Through a path of a few meters you will have free access to the breakfast patio where you will always find fresh fruit at km0, sweets and a water machine all for free consumption of our guests.

roomTypes.name: Superior Double Room with Private Veranda
roomTypes.description: The superior double rooms all have a private veranda overlooking the garden. They are equipped with private bathroom with shower, air conditioning, television, free wi-fi internet connection. Rooms and Suites, authentic jewels set on a rock in the northern tip of the Giglio Island. A magical, fascinating atmosphere of unparalleled beauty. Relaxing days, fiery sunsets, intoxicating evenings.

roomTypes.description: The  Deluxe Double Rooms with Patio is located on the ground floor. It has an internal surface of 26 square meters and is furnished with style, refinement and attention to all details.

roomTypes.description: The Intimate Suites Pegaso di Ponente and Ercole a Levante are located on the first floor and boast a magnificent view of the islands of the Tuscan Archipelago.

roomTypes.name: Junior Suite with Lateral Sea View
roomTypes.description: Located on the first floor, the Junior Suites with Lateral Sea View are the ideal accommodation for those who love absolute relaxation, beauty and style. The suites are authentic pearls of more than 30 square meters finely furnished and rich in elegance and details. The Junior Suites with Lateral Sea View are characterized by a large bathroom with shower. They also have a magnificent and large private terrace with access through the corridor. A refined place where you can dine, read a good book or simply stop to look at the sky and share an unforgettable moment of life with the brightest stars.

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Double Room with Panoramic View
roomTypes.description: The Suites with Terrace and Sea View, are located on the first floor. From here, guests can enjoy a magnificent views of the Tuscan Archipelago Islands. These Suites are over 30 square meters, warm, comfortable and they are characterized by a large bed. The Suites are distinguished by a fine, sober and elegant furnishings and have a large bathroom with shower. The real plus of the Intimate Suite is the large private terrace with exclusive access reserved for guests of the room. The private terrace is available for guests to relax in total privacy, have dinner enjoying unforgettable moments of intimacy or to relax yourself with one of our “Feel your Soul” massages.

description.short: La Guinza is located on the edge of the Monte Labro Nature Reserve in the area of Monte Amiata, a real gem of southern Tuscany. Whether for a weekend or several days, come and discover this ancient volcano, with its centuries old chestnut groves and majestic beech trees. A mountain rich in history, with charming villages (Santa Fiora, Arcidosso, Castel del Piano), just a few kilometers from the sea (about 60 km) and close to the most important towns of Tuscany (Siena 1 hour by car, Florence 2 hours). The famous Saturnia spa is even closer (30 min.) and the San Filippo and Bagno Vignoni spas on the Siena side of the mountain about 40 minutes.

roomTypes.name: Apartment Autumn
roomTypes.description:
The "AUTUMN" Spacious apartment, with independent entrance on the ground floor (next to the laundry room).

This is one of the three apartments belonging to the body of the original structure of the farm. It has a spacious kitchen with dining table, TV, sofa bed.

Two double bedrooms, bathroom for physically impaired, a small room with double bed (cm 1,40 x1, 80) and a bathroom with a large shower.

Barbecue available. ACCESSIBLE TO THE PHYSICALLY IMPAIRED.

roomTypes.name: Winter Apartment
roomTypes.description:
"WINTER" This was the old manor house and has retained its original appearance with the fireplace in the large hall and the stone arch that "separates" the kitchen.

It has two double bedrooms and a bathroom with shower. In front of the fireplace there is a sofa and sofa bed. Next to the front door there is a functioning wood oven.

On the grassy area in front, a barbecue area with table.

roomTypes.name: Spring Apartment
roomTypes.description:
The "SPRING" apartment was once the old barn attached to the main house (“WINTER”).

It also has a separate entrance and consists of a large kitchen with sofa bed, large double bedroom with the possibility of an extra bed, large bathroom with bath and shower.

Satellite TV. Grassy area in front with table and barbecue facilities.

description.short: The farm, is located in the Tuscan Maremma, born with the desire to recover an ancient stone farmhouse finely restored, is located just 700 meters from the ancient medieval castle of Porrona (rebuilt on pre-existing ruins in 1200 AD) where the owner was born and where the ancient aristocratic families of Piccolomini and Tolomei lived.

roomTypes.name: Winter Apartment
roomTypes.description:
The Winter apartment is located on the side of the farmhouse, from the living room and from the bedroom you have a view on both sides of the building, the entrance is independent and is located on the first floor from the exclusive terrace you can admire beautiful olive groves, vineyards, woods and valleys, towards Mount Amiata.

We will be happy to accommodate your small pet friends. The apartments already include linen (bathroom, bedroom, kitchen).

roomTypes.name: Autumn Apartment
roomTypes.description:
The Autumn apartment is located in the central position of the farmhouse, from the living room and from the bedroom you have a view on both sides of the building, the entrance is independent and is located on the beautiful olive groves, vineyards, woods and valleys, towards Mount Amiata. 

We will be happy to accommodate your small pet friends. The apartments already include linen (bathroom, bedroom, kitchen).

roomTypes.name: Summer Apartment
roomTypes.description:
The Estate apartment is located in a privileged and very bright position of the farmhouse, both the living room and the bedroom have a double window with a view on the three sides of the building, the entrance is located like all the other apartments on the first floor and it is independent, from the exclusive terrace you can admire the beauties of our Tuscan Maremma, such as olive groves, vineyards, woods and valleys towards the sea. 

We will be happy to accommodate your small pet friends. The apartments already include linen (bathroom, bedroom, kitchen).

description.short:
If you are looking for an oasis of peace and tranquility, somewhere comfortable and relaxing or somewhere that’s just a little bit different and far from the chaotic city, our country house in Maremma is the perfect place for you.

Poggiolivi is located in the heart of the Tuscan Maremma, a stone’s throw from the famous Parco della Maremma and the sea. The ideal place for a vacation immersed in the landscape with plenty of things to see and do.

roomTypes.name: Superior Double Room
roomTypes.description: From the window you can enjoy a wonderful view of the Maremma Park until you see the sea. The song of the cicadas and the resinous scent of the Mediterranean scrub make the dusk pleasant and relaxing. It is not uncommon to see the flight of some fireflies, which in this uncontaminated area of ​​the Maremma, still keep the company sky-high.

roomTypes.name: Superior Double Room with View
roomTypes.description: From the window you can enjoy a wonderful view of the olive grove and the rolling hills of the Osa valley. The singing of the geese and the fresh scent of the morning make your awakening pleasant. Only then can you capture the essence of a holiday in contact with the unspoiled nature of the Maremma.

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Double Room with Terrace and Panoramic View
roomTypes.description: From the balcony you can enjoy the view of the vineyard, the hills of Uccellina and the fresh sea breezes that in spring and summer cross the Maremma to bring the scent of the sea.

description.short: Location is key at the NH Mechelen hotel. It’s right in the center, just a 10-minute train ride from Brussels Airport. Within a few minutes’ walk you’ve got the pick of Mechelen’s museums, shops, and restaurant-lined squares.

roomTypes.description: Room furnished with warm tones and different styles, cured in top quality design to arouse in our guests a feeling of harmonious comfort. It has a French door overlooking the Medici walls of Grosseto, where you can admire a wonderful view of the city and the surrounding hills. Equipped with the main comforts: fast Wi-Fi, independent air conditioning, hairdryer in the bathroom, luggage rack and flat screen TV.

roomTypes.name: Superior Triple Room with City View
roomTypes.description: The Superior triple room is the flagship of the B&B, located above the Old door of the City of Grosseto, recently built, comfortable bed and Design bathroom with shower, soft top quality cotton towels make this type of room ideal for a stay in the city also for 3 people in the name of comfort, relaxation and elegance. It has a window overlooking the renowned Piazza delle Catene in Grosseto.

roomTypes.description: Room with modern standards, it offers large spaces and comfortable sommier beds with soft mattresses to relax after a day of appointments, meetings and excursions in the Maremma, thanks to the balcony overlooking the city walls, praises the possibility of relaxation and silence despite the structure it is located in the city center. Also ideal for families. It is possible to stay from 2 to 5 people.

description.short:
After 22 years at “Bagno Stella” we wanted something new. We miss some things like grapevine, olive groves and lavender with its blaze of color. Now all we want is soft music in our hearts, we want our pets, horses and birds; and all we have ever been dreaming about has been here all along…our countryside!! Here is the idea: we move on, change our way of life and live our dream…
WELCOME TO “SWEET COTTAGE”

roomTypes.name: Luxury Quadruple Room with Private Garden
roomTypes.description: This is the largest room, studied and designed for our customers who require more space: two communicating double rooms with large shared bathroom.

roomTypes.name: Superior Double Room with Private Veranda
roomTypes.description: All double rooms are different in their size. In the smallest room the shower is right next to the bed. The single Suite has a private garden, and one room has a huge bathroom in the basement.

roomTypes.name: Comfort Double Room with Private Veranda
roomTypes.description: The rooms are intimate, comfortable and perfect for your holiday near Marina di Grosseto. They are equipped with a bedroom, private bathroom, satellite TV, air conditioning and garden. Guarded on-site parking. Access to the swimming pool.

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Triple Room with Private Veranda
roomTypes.description: Obtained from the old stable: we have kept some original details of the floor and the manger which, adapted, has become an open wardrobe. We have created a spacious double bedroom, equipped with an extra room with space for relaxation and a sofa bed, which can host a 3rd person on each occasion. The bathroom is very comfortable and spacious, with a large shower ... finished with a chic touch!

data.name: Dimora Santa Margherita - Charme Relais in Tuscany [SANDBOX]

description.short:
Dimora Santa Margherita is the ideal place for a charming and exclusive holiday in Tuscany. Nature here prevails over everything, it is not difficult to meet foxes, deers, wild boars, herresses and badgers.

A suggestive country road, which once connected Castiglioncello Bandini with Grosseto, will transport you from everyday reality to a unique dimension... you will find it difficult to come back home again!
The location is in a small town, an ideal setting for those who love to live special moments in a romantic setting, surrounded by a luxury full of flavor and tradition.

roomTypes.name: Junior Suite Deluxe with Panoramic View
roomTypes.description: The Wisteria Suite is surrounded by precious materials inspired by splendid flowers, lilac walls, white furniture and woven reed armchairs. The headboard is an empty frame: a perfect place for dreams and promises of love. According to some guests, this is the perfect “Cupid suite”.

roomTypes.name: Suite with Private Sauna and Garden with Panoramic View
roomTypes.description: The Montecucco Suite has elegant furniture, light white curtains, beige walls and is a short walk from the bedroom to the wellbeing centre in which, in front of a Finnish sauna and a wooden sink, a vintage bathtub “reigns”. The suite also holds a delicious secret: between spring and summer, the red-hot light of the sunset squeezes through into the shower.

roomTypes.name: Suite with Private Garden and Panoramic View
roomTypes.description: The bedrooms recently refurbished are designed as Suites, each one unique in style, they all open on a private patio fronting the olive grove which appears to be hugging the rolling hills.

description.short: Palazzo Renieri is an intimate, discreet, romantic and comfortable hotel in the heart of Colle Alta. The Palace was built at the twilight of the sixteenth century by the Renieri family, who like others moved here for trade and contributed to the building development and urbanization of the city of Colle.

roomTypes.name: Classic Single Room
roomTypes.description: All our classic single rooms are located on the ground floor of the hotel. This type of room is suitable for the single traveler or the businessman / woman who needs rest and tranquility in view of their commitments. The room offers two single beds, with private bathroom, desk, flat screen TV, window with internal view or on the valley, more silent and suggestive. The ideal room to find rest and serenity before any day of travel or work, in this extraordinary land.

roomTypes.name: Comfort Double Room
roomTypes.description: The comfort double is the ideal choice for the demanding couple looking for comfort and attention to detail.This type of room, much more spacious than the classicthey are complete with every comfort, like our other rooms, but as we have mentioned, it is the details that make the difference. The large king-size double bed is here placed on a lilac leather headboard, the floor is rigidly parquet and among the additional services of the room there is a convenient luggage rack and a minibar full of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Some of these rooms, located on particularly popular sides of the historic center of Colle Alta, are equipped with double windows and acoustic glazing to ensure peaceful nights. The other comfort rooms, on the other hand, overlook breathtaking views of the Val d'Elsa between green nature and imposing religious architecture, to give you a smile every time you wake up.

roomTypes.name: Triple-Room Deluxe
roomTypes.description: Our deluxe triple is a particularly large room (almost 30 m2) that offers customers a unique view. In fact, the window opens onto the valley below, unique and singular, on the surrounding soft hills and on the majestic convent of San Francis. This room is equipped with all comforts, consisting of flat screen TV, desk, 2 mirrors and some walls of the rooms, are decorated with hand-made paintings by the artist Jacqueline Tune. In addition to the king size double bed with colored leather headboard, in the room you will also find a comfortable single sofa bed. A large bathroom with a spectacular crystal shower, towel warmer and bathroom cabinet with chest of drawers and finally our courtesy kit. In the bedroom there is also a spacious wardrobe with two doors and a coat hanger located at the entrance to the room. An ideal room for family or friends where you can find all the possible comforts with the most exclusive aesthetic details of our proposal.

roomTypes.name: Classic Double
roomTypes.description: This type of room, the  classic double, meets the needs of the couple. Colorful and elegant with a comfortable king size double bed set against the wall, the room offers a spacious private bathroom with shower and a desk for any need. The modern furnishings and the pastel colors present make the room spaces closed with double windows and acoustic glass even more pleasant. We have provided in all the rooms overlooking the square of the historic center and the main street, this kind of soundproofing service for the room, to try to minimize for our customers, all the possible noises and noises at night that could compromise the climate of peace and tranquility that our hotel wants to convey with its offers.

roomTypes.name: Quadruple Luxury Room
roomTypes.description: Spacious and welcoming both for the family and for four adults, our  luxury quadruple roomit has all the comforts to make your overnight stay pleasant and relaxing. A beautiful gray parquet floor that fits well with the furnishings and colors of the room and full wood windows with internal blackouts that open onto the magnificent view of the historic center of Colle di Val d'Elsa. This type of room is equipped with all the comforts ranging from flat screen TV, through the desk, some artistic mirrors and colored curtains in respect of the colors of the room. A large double bed with 2 other comfortable single beds that leave all the space needed to enjoy the environment even in 4 people. Large bathroom with sparkling crystal shower, towel warmer, bathroom cabinet with chest of drawers and courtesy kit. In the bedroom there is also a large wardrobe with two doors and a coat hanger at the entrance.

roomTypes.name: Superior Connecting Rooms
roomTypes.description:
Our  superior communicating is usually chosen by families. They consist of a spacious and colorful bedroom with a king-size double bed and a single bed, communicating with another bedroom with two single beds. This room type has only one bathroom which is located inside the room with 2 single beds. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, wifi and panoramic views. 
The furnishings, minimal but essential, offer the greatest comforts, such as flat screen TV, sofa, desk, mirrors, colored curtains in the room. Some rooms are additionally decorated, with hand-made paintings by the artist Jacqueline Tune.

description.short:
Riviera Blu Hotel is a modern 3 star establishment completely renovated and under new management, where a warm and friendly welcome awaits you in a comfortable family atmosphere.

The priorities are kindness, cleanliness, hospitality and quality service and our aim is to maintain these features on a high standard.

Our Hotel has a special décor and we do our best to keep it always freshly renovated so that our customers can relax and enjoy our amenties.

The Hotel is located in a peaceful part of Tirrenia, 150 metres from the beach and the sea, only 11 Km. from the centre of Pisa.

roomTypes.name: Single Room
roomTypes.description:
Our 2 single rooms are located on the first floor, the furnishings are in sea water colored wicker.

Both rooms have a terrace and a private bathroom with shower equipped with complimentary toiletries, hairdryer and a line to hang laundry in the shower compartment.

Both the air conditioning and the heating can be regulated independently.

Furthermore, the rooms are equipped with desk, telephone, flat screen HD LED TV, wall safe, wake up service and free Wi-Fi Internet connection. Telephone, HD LED TV, wall safe and free Wi-Fi Internet connection.

The cleaning of the rooms is daily and is carried out from 09:00 to 12:00, the change of sheets is done every 3 days, while the towels are changed at the request of the customer.

The breakfast service in the room is active from 8:00 to 10:00.

Smoking is forbidden in all rooms , while it is allowed on the terraces.

roomTypes.name: Triple Room
roomTypes.description:
The rooms have a private bathroom equipped with shower, hairdryer and a line for hanging linen in the shower compartment.

Both the air conditioning and the heating can be regulated independently.

In addition, the rooms are equipped with desk, telephone, Hd Led TV, wall safe and free Wi-Fi internet connection.

The cleaning of the rooms is daily and is carried out from 09:00 to 12:00, the change of sheets is done every 3 days, while the towels are changed at the request of the customer.

We can also, if required, add a cot (for children up to 14 years) or a cot (up to 4 years). The service has an extra cost.

The breakfast service in the room is active from 8:00 to 10:00.

Smoking is prohibited in all rooms.

amenities.formatted: Air conditioning individually controlled in room

roomTypes.name: Double or Twin Room
roomTypes.description:
On request the rooms can have either a double bed or two separate beds.

The furnishings on the first floor are in sea water-colored wicker, while on the second floor they are in cream and hazelnut colored laminate.

Almost all rooms have a terrace, while all have a private bathroom with shower equipped with complimentary toiletries, hairdryer and a line to hang the laundry in the shower.

Both the air conditioning and the heating can be regulated independently.

In addition, the rooms are equipped with desk, telephone, flat screen HD LED TV, wall safe, wake-up service and free Internet connection.

The cleaning of the rooms is daily and is carried out from 09:00 to 12:00, the change of sheets is done every 3 days, while the towels are changed at the request of the customer.

We can also, if required, add a cot (for children up to 14 years) or a cot (max 4 years).
The service has an extra cost.

The breakfast service in the room is active from 8:00 to 10:00.

Smoking is forbidden in all rooms, while it is allowed on the terraces.

description.short:
The NH Collection Palacio de Burgos, formerly known as NH Palacio de la Merced, hotel is in the heart of Burgos, by the River Arlanzón and a few minutes’ walk from the UNESCO-protected cathedral. The building itself is every bit as impressive as the setting – a magnificent Gothic creation built in the 16th and 17th centuries.

-short walk to the Congress Palace and Museum of Human Evolution
-lots of monuments, shops and restaurants nearby
-historical building with a showpiece cloister dating back to the 16th century

description.short: The NH Pozuelo Ciudad de la Imagen hotel is in the business district, a 15-minute drive from Madrid’s city center. From here, it’s only a 5-minute walk to Kinepolis, a cinema and leisure complex that’s often used as a conference center. The hotel has 76 comfortable rooms, which are decorated in warm, autumnal colors and come with plasma TVs, free Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

description.short: The hotel is steps away from Orient Bay. This side of the island has incredible body surfing waves, comfortable water temperatures and gentle breeze to counteract the searing Caribbean sun. The hotel 4 stars has a fresh water swimming pool, a private beach with sun loungers and a bar restaurant where you can especially have your breakfasts facing the sea, feet on the sand.

roomTypes.name: Classic Junior Suite
roomTypes.description: Classic Junior Suites fully renovated on july 2019 offers a very high-class and roomy place to be in a contemporary and authentic style. These suites can accomodate until 2 persons thanks to a king-size bed 2x2m and a sofa. They also features a bathroom with an italian shower. Located on the ground floor, they don't have kitchen but a fridge, kettle and coffee maker at disposal.

roomTypes.name: Junior Suite - Premium Garden
roomTypes.description: Premium Junior Suites fully renovated in 2019 offers a very high-class and roomy place to be in a contemporary and authentic style. These Premium junior suites can accomodate until 3 persons (some 4 persons*) equipped with a king-size bed 2x2m and a sofa bed for one person (or 2) or 2 chairs. They also features a very functional and well-equipped kitchenette and a bathroom with an italian shower. They are located on the ground floor.
